data.title: ProbablyMonsters
data.text:
Harold Ryan

CEO & Founder

With over 25 years of games industry success, Harold has generated over $5B of revenue through iconic franchises such as Halo, Destiny, Age of Empires, and MechWarrior.

Allen Fong

General Manager

A veteran with gaming experience in North America and Asia, Allen has aligned business and creative goals to bring outstanding games to players throughout his career.

Anne Marko

VP Global Marketing

A former executive at Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment, Anne is a proven leader with 20 years of experience in customer-focused marketing and sales strategy.

Chris Opdahl

General Manager

With over 20 years of experience, Chris is adept at directing and managing large organizations while creating high-functioning and empowered teams that build quality games.

Carlos Sanchez

General Manager

With 20+ years of experience, Carlos has held prominent positions at Riot Games, Turn 10, Bungie, Xbox and EA. He's led large, AAA teams to success by doubling player base and driving operational maturity.

Adam Rymer

Chief Product Officer

With expertise leading multi-functional teams across many business segments including film, gaming, TV, digital, sports, and music, Adam provides insight and guidance for success across the board.

Shannon Armstrong

Chief Human Resources Officer

Shannon is an HR and recruiting leader with over 20 years of experience in technology startups, retail organizations, and finance.

Steve Burnaroos

VP Operations

A proven leader with over a decade of experience overseeing the daily operations of heralded businesses like Bungie, Steve brings passion, organization, and efficiency to every department of the company.
